verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Only you deserve my praise
Its for you alone
I will praise you
I will worship you
Only you deserve my praise

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Yahweh Yahweh
I glorify your name
Yahweh
I bow

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Before your throne
I glorify your name
Before your throne
I bow
